title: WTF RIOT? THAT SCORE...

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: HOW IS THAT NOT AN S+?

replies.body:
How is that not an S MINUS?
Probably because you didn't get towers or CS.
League Mastery System depends on these 3 things:
Kills. 
Objectives.
CS.

If you die AT ALL you sacrifice a lot of mastery. But you didn't.
You went 23/0.
Your CS is poor for 35 min tho.

Deaths don't subtract too much from mastery, at least not in my experience. Also I'm pretty sure warding comes into play for the mastery, and he didn't by a single pink ward. His team didn't take a single baron and only got 2/4 dragons, depending on how much objectives matter for mid lane, that could have been huge. Biggest thing was definitely the cs though, he could easily have had at least another 100 cs or more.

You are being compared to other veigars, so missing that much farm will destroy your score. In a game as good as that 200 probably would have been fine, but by that time normally as veig you want like 300.
So... the score system encourages u to farm when you are ahead and not gank/help your team?
You are encouraged to do both. 10-20 cs is about worth a kill. Yeah you made your team a lot of kills, but you lost a lot from farm.
Your CS is like 70% of what it should be.
There seemed to be a bug with 0 deaths. Bet u'll get an S- if u had died once... 23/1/12 kda
